footer.description: Your trusted partner in international car imports and auctions since 2013.

hero.title: Selling Cars, Building Trust
hero.description: At the heart of our business lies a commitment to more than just selling vehicles—we’re dedicated to building lasting relationships. We understand that buying a car is a significant decision, and our goal is to make…

popularDeals.title: Most Popular Car Rental Deals
popularDeals.description: Discover unbeatable deals on the most sought-after rental cars. Whether you need a stylish ride for a special occasion or a reliable vehicle for everyday use…

importCosts.title: Calculate Your Import Costs
importCosts.description: Get an instant estimate of all costs involved in importing your dream vehicle. Our comprehensive calculator includes shipping, customs, duties, and all associated fees.

cars.title: Premium Inventory
cars.subtitle: Browse our curated collection of luxury and performance vehicles from around the world

results.found: {count, plural, one {# vehicle found} other {# vehicles found}}
results.noResults: No vehicles match your filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.

page.title: Import Cost Calculator
page.description: Get an accurate estimate of all costs involved in importing your vehicle. Our calculator includes shipping, customs duties, inspection fees, and more.

form.purchasePriceHint: Enter the auction or purchase price of the vehicle
form.noticeBody: This calculator provides an estimate based on typical import scenarios. Actual costs may vary depending on specific vehicle details, current exchange rates, and customs regulations. For a precise quote, please contact our team.

breakdown.title: Cost Breakdown
breakdown.empty: Enter vehicle details and calculate to see your cost breakdown

partners.title: Together we create success
partners.description: Join Prime Cars’ global network and unlock new opportunities in the automotive import industry. We’re looking for strategic partners who share our vision of excellence and innovation.

benefits.title: Why Partner With Prime Cars
benefits.description: Join a network of successful partners and benefit from our expertise, resources, and global reach

growth.title: Growth Opportunities
growth.description: Access to expanding markets and continuous business growth through our established network and proven track record.

trusted.title: Trusted Partnership
trusted.description: Build a long-term relationship based on transparency, reliability, and mutual success in the automotive industry.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: Leverage our international network spanning 15+ countries and connections with major auction houses worldwide.

cta.title: Ready to Start a Partnership?
cta.description: Let’s discuss how we can work together to achieve success in the global automotive market.

about.heroBody: Prime Cars was founded on a simple belief: importing a car shouldn’t be complicated. We’ve built a platform that combines cutting-edge technology with deep industry expertise to make international car trading accessible to everyone.
about.missionBody: To democratize access to the global automotive market by providing transparent, efficient, and trustworthy import services that empower buyers worldwide.
about.visionBody: To become the world’s most trusted platform for international vehicle trading, setting new standards for transparency and customer experience.
about.valuesBody: Integrity, transparency, and customer-first thinking guide every decision we make and every service we provide.
about.journeyBody: From a small team with a big vision to a global leader in automotive imports

companyFounded.title: Company Founded
companyFounded.description: Started operations with a focus on Japanese car imports. Processed our first 50 vehicles.

europeanExpansion.title: European Expansion
europeanExpansion.description: Expanded operations to include premium European vehicles. Established partnerships with German and UK auction houses.

platformLaunch.title: Platform Launch
platformLaunch.description: Launched our digital platform, introducing the first online cost calculator and real-time tracking for customers.

globalNetwork.title: Global Network
globalNetwork.description: Reached 15 countries in our network. Surpassed 10,000 vehicles imported with a 98% satisfaction rate.

industryLeader.title: Industry Leader
industryLeader.description: Recognized as one of the top import services globally. Introduced AI-powered vehicle matching and expanded to electric vehicle imports.

innovationGrowth.title: Innovation & Growth
innovationGrowth.description: Launched blockchain-based documentation system. Achieved carbon-neutral shipping on all routes.

about.statsBody: Our track record speaks to our commitment to excellence
about.whyBody: What sets us apart in the global automotive import industry

endToEnd.title: End-to-End Service
endToEnd.description: From vehicle sourcing to delivery at your door, we manage every step of the import process with precision and care.

transparency.title: Full Transparency
transparency.description: No hidden fees, no surprises. Our cost calculator and tracking system keep you informed at every stage.

expertise.title: Market Expertise
expertise.description: Over a decade of experience gives us unmatched insights into global automotive markets and import regulations.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: Every vehicle undergoes rigorous inspection and comes with comprehensive documentation and history reports.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.description: 24/7 customer support from import specialists who understand your needs and guide you through the process.

network.title: Global Network
network.description: Strategic partnerships with leading auction houses, logistics providers, and inspection agencies worldwide.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Import Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust Prime Cars for their international automotive needs.

settingsView.shippingPricesSubtitle: Manage city-specific shipping, with a safe global adjustment control.
settingsView.globalAdjustmentBodyEmphasis: add to all city shipping prices
settingsView.globalAdjustmentExample: Example: if all are 100 and you enter 100 → all become 200.
settingsView.citiesSubtitle: Update or delete shipping prices per city.
settingsView.deleteBody: This will remove the city from shipping price management. This action can’t be undone.
